"shiftType": 1,//shift type values - > 1-auto ,2-manual
    "startDate": "2022-08-01",//current date when shift is added
    "duration": 2,//no of days of shift duration,default value 1
    "startTime": "10:20",//time at which shift starts
    "endTime": "10:30",//time at which shift ends
    "days": [
        "monday",
        "tuesday",
        "saturday"
    ],//selected days to run shift
    "branchId":"NIL1"//branchId to which this data is to be inputted

item.name: View All Leave Application of a employee

request.description:
body:{
    orderType: 0,// assign values from 0-4
    tableNumber: String,Pk of table (dine in case)
    items: [
      {
            "category": "62a1a0b4a98e58f60a0cebd5",//food item category p.k
            "subcategory": "62a1a0b4a98e58f60a0cebd5",//food item subcategory p.k
            "item": "62a1a159a98e58f60a0cebde",//food item  p.k
            "dimension":250,//food item dimension
            "quantity": 4,//food item order qty
            "unitPrice": 100,//food item unitPrice
            "note": "need fresh",//customer note
            "offer": null //food item offer->to be used from food item data
      },
    ], 
    paymentMethod: {}, //structure will be mentioned below this payload
    totalAmount: Number, //order totalAmount    
    coupons: String, //coupons used in order,null if an offer persist
    offers: [], //offers applied on order ,structure will be mentioned below
    discount: Number,
    shipmentCharge: Number, //applicable  in case of deivery
    cus_id: String, //customers PK
    usedPoints: Number, //reward point used
    wallet: Number, // wallet points used by customer
    creditCleared: [{}]//previous orders whose payment is half or fuly pending structure will be mentioned below,
}
----------------------------------------------------
paymentMethod: Case Cash:{
    type:"Cash",
    date:"YYY-MM-DD"//date on which payment made
    paidAmount:Number//amount paid by customer
}

case Card:{
    type:"Card",
    cardNo:**********//cardnumber of customer
    provider:Visa/Master//card provider name
    date:"YYY-MM-DD"//date on which payment made
    paidAmount:Number//amount paid by customer
}

case upi:{
    type:"upi",
    provider:gpay/phonepay//upi provider,
    account:upiid of customer
    date:"YYY-MM-DD"//date on which payment made
    paidAmount:Number//amount paid by customer
}
---------------------------------------------------
creditCleared:[{
    order_id:Pk of pending order,to be fetched  frm credit
    balance:pending amount
}]
---------------------------------------------------

CASE EXISTING ORDER
body:{
    order_id,usedPoints
}

CASE NON EXISTING ORDER
body:{
    items:array containing ordered items as same as bill order,add order api's,
    orderType:type of order,
    tableNumber:if dine in select orderNumber,
    totalAmount:Total of order,
    coupons:value of used coupons,
    customerId:value of customer's primary key,
    usedPoints:used reward points
}

parameter to pass:
cus_id,mobileNo
pass customer id from order to  fetch all credit s of that customer.if credit exist a list is returned else empty list returns

Payload Details Of This Api Is  
body:{  
{  
"suppId": String,//Pk OF Supplier  
"purchaseDate": String,//purchase date to be passed in ISO date format  
"expiryDate": String,//expiryDate to be passed in iso date format  
"details": String,//details of purchase  
"paymentType": Strng,type of payment used  
"purchaseInfo": \[  
{  
"itemInfo":String,//pk of item  
"quantity": number,//purchase quantity  
"price": number//price of item

"igst": number //igst percentage value

"cgst": number //cgst percentage value

"sgst": number //sgst percentage value  
}  
\],  
"paidAmount": number,//paidAmount of purchase  
"grandTotal": number,//total amount of purchase  
"credit": number,//pending amount in purchase  
"invoiceNo": number,//purchase invoiceNo  
"igstTotal": number, //igstTotal of purchase  
"sgstTotal": number, /sgstTotal of purchase  
"cgstTotal": number//cgstTotal of purchase  
}  
}
